page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content:
I woke up on the 3rd June 1985 at seven o'clock. I got dressed and went downstairs. My mum was making the sandwiches. I went outside and went down to the barn. I had to take my pony to his field. When I had put his halter on I led him down the road. Grandad was in the farmyard.
When Kasmik was in his field I walked back home. When I got inside, I went upstairs and changed into my summer dress. I went downstairs and had a wash. My brother, Scott, was still in bed so I had to wake him up.
When he had dressed we both had breakfast. It was{cornflakes}with a lot of sugar on. Continued...
